channel.title: iPad on S/1999 U 2
channel.description: Recent content in iPad on S/1999 U 2

item.title: App Store Dark Patterns
item.description: Services are Apples Next Big Business No, I didn’t want notifications the first time you asked. Or the second time. So no, I still don’t want any notifications, even if you put them inline with the content. Apple sneakily trying to spam me.
